level.text: The licensee under a Caterer’s license may store alcoholic beverages in the District of Columbia upon the approval of the Board. The licensee under a Caterer’s license shall not store alcoholic beverages intended for use in the District of Columbia outside of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by D.C. ACT 15-442 published at 51 DCR 6525 (July 2, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008).
